Title: Fodor's London 2015 (Full-color Travel Guide)
Author: Fodor's
Torrent file name: Fodor's London 2015 (Full-color Travel Guide) Retail epub [Itzy]
Publisher: Fodor's (August 12, 2014)
Sold by: Random House LLC
Genre: Travel Guide
Format: Retail .epub

Crowds continue to flock to England's capital as much to discover the hippest galleries, shops, and exciting nightlife scene as to enjoy world-renowned museums, the royal palace, and some of the most happening restaurants and hotel openings in the world. This new Fodor's London 2015 captures the best of the best.

NEW THIS EDITION: With its state-of-the-art hotels, glittering new restaurants, and multi-million-pound makeovers of museums, London is one of Europe's most exciting destinations. This new edition continues to cover the latest hotel openings, new nightlife spots, and a growing list of recommended restaurants for all budgets.

ILLUSTRATED FEATURES: Magazine-style color features explore essential London sights like the Tower of London, the British Museum, St. Paul's Cathedral, Westminster Abbey, the Thames River, and the Globe Theater as well as experiences such as exploring the city's famous green parks. 

ESSENTIAL TRIP-PLANNING TOOLS: Convenient overviews of each neighborhood's highlights make planning simple, and as do best bets for hotels and restaurants, and features on the city's top attractions, free things to do, and family favorites. 

DISCERNING RECOMMENDATIONS: Fodor's London 2014 offers savvy advice and recommendations from local writers to help travelers make the most of their time. Fodor's Choice designates our best picks, from hotels to nightlife. "Word of Mouth" quotes from fellow travelers provide valuable insights.

VALUE ADD PULLOUT MAP: A handy take-along London map provides added value, giving travelers essential information about top attractions and nearby dining so they can travel with confidence.
